#rstats educators, if you've been looking for a no-frills guide for creating a 📦package for learnr tutorials, then I've got just the @RStudioEDU blog post for you! 🧑‍💻

Here's how you make that R package for interactive tutorials: 

💻 https://t.co/4lj8FMRtVB https://t.co/6ZCJ1aSJQA

Blog post about the new {usemodels} 📦!

https://t.co/dzDyNLV4Lx

Use it to write out tidymodels templates for your analyses. 

#rstats https://t.co/6zNNnj3Zm5

New blogpost on reusable functions and custom themes for {gt} tables!

Includes example tables and my recreations w/ #rstats code for:
- ESPN
- PFF
- FiveThirtyEight

Themes/functions can save you lots of time when creating beautiful tables!

https://t.co/4BD335VfXc
I came across this cool resource while browsing #rstats. It's really nice to have many of the R books in one place! https://t.co/FmJ4leDB77
Building a Simple Pipeline in R  {https://t.co/oAesTtBXnA} #rstats #DataScience

Took longer than expected but R finally submitted to my will. This is a 1985 Geological Map of Aso-san, Japan's largest active volcano. It has produced more explosive eruptions than any other volcano in the world. 

In glorious hi-res. :)

#rayshader adventures, an #rstats tale https://t.co/m4HuwCjFjE
